item.title: Resources for historical research
item.description: Here I share some online resouces that I found useful for historical research. Roman Empire ORBIS: The Stanford Geospatial Network Model of the Roman World US Regimental losses in the American Civil War, 1861-1865 The War of the Rebellion: a Compilation of the Official Records of the Union and Confederate Armies The Library of Congress - Digital Collections The Library of Congress - Chronicling America Germany EFYS Zeitungsinformationssystem (German newspapers) Deutsche Digitale Bibliothek Deutsche Biographie Finland Digital Archives Semantic Computing Research Group Ireland Military Archives Soviet Union The Melbourne Gateway to Research on Soviet History
